entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 17. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few rain showers beginning late this evening and ending before morning then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
